actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The polar bear makes one Bite attack and one Claws attack. If both attacks hit one creature, the target is grappled (escape DC 15). The bear can grapple only one creature at a time.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. _Hit:_ 9 (1d8+5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 12 (2d6+5) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Heightened Smell
special_abilities.desc: The bear's Perception is 18 when perceiving by smell.
